posts.title: Sud
posts.excerpt: Synopsis A look at the troubled area of America’s Deep South, primarily focusing on the sadistic murder of James Byrd, an African-American man dragged to his death by three white supremacists. posts.title: Fai bei sogni

posts._title: Lina Wertmüller – Mimì metallurgico ferito nell’onore AKA The Seduction of Mimi (1972)
posts.title: Mimì metallurgico ferito nell’onore
posts.excerpt: Mimi is a Sicilian dockworker who loses his job when he votes against the Mafia candidate in what he thinks is a secret ballot.
